parameters.name: createTrigger
parameters.helptext: Defines whether or not to use the trigger to automatically unassign tickets

parameters.name: triggerTitle
parameters.helptext: Lets you dynamically define the trigger title

parameters.name: userFieldName
parameters.helptext: Lets you define the user field label

parameters.name: userFieldKey
parameters.helptext: Lets you define the user field key and tag

parameters.name: confirmChange
parameters.helptext: Determines if a modal will be shown when the out of office toggle is clicked on

parameters.name: unassignTickets
parameters.helptext: If set to true, will automatically unassign tickets without needing to check the box in the modal (TODO: remove the checkbox if this is true)

parameters.name: preventAssignOOO
parameters.helptext: Enables or disables the save hook
